data.name: Raifu Wars - Puska Character
data.detailed_description:
Unlock Puska as a new playable character in Raifu Wars! This mysterious and adorable character can charm her way to the top anywhere on the map! With her special abilities she can draw cards outside her territory and tier up in her opponent's bases.

Features an all-new character with art, music, and voice acting.
data.about_the_game:
Unlock Puska as a new playable character in Raifu Wars! This mysterious and adorable character can charm her way to the top anywhere on the map! With her special abilities she can draw cards outside her territory and tier up in her opponent's bases.

Features an all-new character with art, music, and voice acting.
data.short_description: Unlock Puska as a new playable character in Raifu Wars!
data.supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, Polish, Portuguese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 64-bit x86 CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Designed for at least 1280 x 720 screen resolution
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mavericks (OSX 10.9)
  • Processor: Intel chipset
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu/Linux Mint/Debian
  • Processor: 64-bit x86 CPU
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Designed for at least 1280 x 720 screen resolution
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
